widget.name: CEAS Access Point
widget.description:
CEAS Access Point: A Cross Platform Mobile Application for Gordon College, College of Education, Arts and Sciences
This application will help the Students to easily access their grades by using their smartphones. It is also help the instructors to easily view their class loads on the current semester.
This application is created using HTML5, Javascript and CSS and it is available on Firefox Marketplace for Firefox OS,and Google Play for Android phones.
widget.author: Team Cache
